price: Aadfoͻ no nso yεde mframa bͻne huhuuhu bi a εpͻ soͻ na εsεee wͻn.
arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā ʿādun fa-uh'likū birīḥin ṣarṣarin ʿātiyatin
